transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir ji namaskar.
Customer: Haan, namaskar sir, kal bhi ji the aap, Manshu baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Haan ji sir, haan ji haan sir. Boliye.
Customer: Sir baat aisi hai aur koi issue nahi hai ji hamare paas.
Baki issue to hamara hai, wo aapke sath support lene ka, wo hum lenge ji. Pehli baat to aise hai aap.
Executive: Support.
Customer: Support support support sath sath benefit.
Executive: Accha accha okay, theek hai theek hai, benefit ji ji.
Customer: Haan haan, sir baat aisi hai.
Kyuki hamara jo Rapid Pharmaceutical ka wo to platform nahi hai. Hum jo platform hai wo IndiaMART ka hai.
IndiaMART ka jo bhi matlab ki hai ek maan lo dukan banai hui hai, maan lo mera kehne ka maksad hai. Usme 5000 companies hai ji.
Hello.
Executive: Ji ji sunna, boliye.
Customer: Haan haan, usme se maan lo humne koi bhi dal diya, injectable dal diya, Micacin dal diya humne ji, wo kisi ne maine order dalne ke liye dal diya.
Usme se aapke paas jo 5000 companies hai usme aapka jo Micacin aata hai 1000 company ka aata hai.
Aapki jo lead hai, matlab ki wo padi hai. 1000 companies mein se koi bhi banda usko utha le ji.
Baat ni padegi, chahe pehle second ch utha le, duje second ch utha le, teeje second ch utha le.
Wo uth gayi ji. Baat aisi hai jo 5000 companies hai usko 100 ko sabko hona chahiye na ji wo jiske jiske aata hai 2000 companies ka. Baat aisi hai kyuki jo hamara kehne ka maksad hai bhi hamare paas jo aapke dwara bheji gayi lead hai.
Wo hamare paas nahi aa rahi.
Kisi ki tarah ki nahi aa rahi. Kyuki jab main kehte hai bhi aap refresh kar lo ya usko matlab ki bulk mein dal lo to bhi nahi aati ji. Matlab ki jo aati hai 15 din purani aati hai, 10 din purani aati hai, 20 din purani aati hai. Hamara maksad ye hai, hamara aapka jo bhi platform hai maan lo hum isiliye bada matlab ki hamara jo target tha aise nahi hai bhi teen bande ka kaam karne ke liye tha. Te sadda wo target aise si bhi asi teen mahine de vich innu cover kar lange.
Hmm hmm.
Ram ram. To main keh raha tha sir main kal bhi aapka profile check kar raha tha na aap jo keh rahe ho purani leads aati hai to last ke maine panch bylead check kiya tha jo aapne consume kiya hai wo sare same day ka hai sir. Matlab jo 11 tarikh ka 11 koi aapne consume kiya to aisa nahi hai teen din char din purani bylead aapko dikh raha hai.
Executive: Sir meri baat to suno na. Wo jis din se aapse baat chal rahi hai.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Maan lo meri baat suno.
Customer: Daso daso.
Executive: Uske pehle bhi mere paas photo hai ji. Maine jab bhi asi bylead na sadde bacche karan yehi hai sir. Kalle thode sadda 40000 nahi kharch aaya. Jeda bacche sadde lagge hoye ne, tusi ae dekh lo ek baccha ta asi hata ke unnu laya, oda 11 lakh rupaye da package si ITI de vich. Jede dusre bacche ne, oda bhi sadda kharcha pe reha. Matlab ki 20000 50000 rupaye mahina kharcha pe reha. Sir kalla thode kharche de utte nahi 50000 rupya asi hor bhi pa rahe ha. Hun jado 11 lakh wala baccha asi hataya, wo thode hun 40000 wale package len vaste ta asi hataya nahi bhi do lead vaste hataya. Wo thode waliya asi vadde package len vaste hi hataya par gal is tarah jado thode kole lead nahi hegiya. Je meri tha te tusi hovo na, eh socho bhi main wo dukan de andar bad gaya koi cheez len vaste, wo cheez len vaste jado main demand kiti te maan lo bhi aa cheez da maan lo mera competition hi la lo bhi hazar bande naal aa. Tusi jeda lead aa wo char bandeya nu select karke de diti.
Executive: Aap baat karte karte Punjabi bolne lag gaye the Hindi sorry.
Customer: Accha. Nahi nahi wo jo hamara maksad hai na sir bhi jo hamari lead hai aapke platform pe aati hai wo aapke platform pe rahe bhi hame jab bhi hum hamara dil karega usko utha kar hum le lenge. Aise nahi hoga bhi matlab ki hamari aapki manmarji se lead aayi matlab ki 10 din mein aayi aapne hamara group bana diya group mein lead aayi uske baad hamare paas aayi. Jab hamara baccha waha par baitha hai hamare jo karinde waha pe baithe hai usi hisab se usko aana chahiye ji baat aisi hai usko to hona hi nahi chahiye ji.
Executive: Sir dekho dekho pharma main aapko batata hu pharmaceutical jo hai sir apni jo category hai na isme bulk order aur jo aap keh sakte hai ka jaha tak ho hamari team aapko proper video meeting karke guide kar rahi hai aur.
Customer: Sir wo to baad ki baat hai video meeting nu pehla gal suno sir. Pehla ek.
Executive: Itna competition.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi sir. Sir asi video meeting kuch nahi leni main thanu gal dassa. Sanne koi baat ch nahi karni pehla meri baat to sun lo na ji pehla baat to sun lo sir. Bolye. Sadde kolo asi thode kolo jado nahi saruga wo cheez nu tang karange. Jedia saddia leadan dia saddia benefit aa sadda wo sadda show hona chahida samne asi jado marzi le liye ji bas. Hmm hmm.
Gal ta ehi aa. Saddda wo maksad hi nahi hega na bhi thode kole ek mile ya do mile. Jo sanne paise ditte ne thanu sanu cheez milni chahidi aa ji bas gal ta ehe aa thode platform te. Jado sanu dekho meri gal suno asi 9 baje chak liye, asi 11 baje chak liye, asi 12 baje chak liye, jado sadda dil karuga sotho do leadan lenia ne asi le lange bas. Eh ki matlab aa ji sanu purania leadan ya koi khatam hoiya leadan tusi asi 200 dia 200 sanu show kar dene aa ji sir. Fir madam kehnde kehnde ji thodia kehnde tin thamo kehnde aaiya hoiya ne Delhi to utho utho. Sir jeda 200 tusi asi 150 product use kita thoda leadan use kitia ne wo dasso all India de vichon chakkia hoiya ne ji. Sakhan de mare asi aakhia nahi aandi aa na asi. Sir inna dhakka thodi hunda ji.
Executive: Hindi hindi sir nahi samajh aa raha kuch wo audio nahi aa raha. Sir kuch audio nahi aa raha beech mein haan.
Customer: Sir baat aisi hai.
Executive: Accha sir baat aisi hai hamara maksad jo hai hamara jo hai jo aapka lead hai hum humse baat hui hui hai humko usko lena hai ji.
Customer: Ji ji.
Customer: Te baat aisi hai wo aapke platform pe hame samne jo hai matlab ki IndiaMART ka platform hame dikhni chahiye ji. Maan lo aapke paas 50 aati hai 50 dikhni chahiye, 20 aati hai 20 dikhni chahiye, 100 aati hai 100 dikhni chahiye. Bas hum usme se jab hamara dil karega hum le lenge.
Executive: Ji ji bilkul sir. Jaiz hai bas. Ab ek cheez hai haan karke le raha hu sir ye sari cheeze karke dunga aapke liye aur ummid hai aapki leads bhi consume ho raha hai jo recent wali bylead hai wo bhi consume ho rahi hai aur sath mein jitni leads.
Customer: Ye aana chahiye.
Executive: Sir ho nahi rahi.
Customer: Ho nahi rahi ji ho nahi rahi. Wo hai consume. Aavi kuch keh do ji innu kuch keh do ji sadde kole koi hal nahi ji eda. Koi isme nahi mila te hamare dwara 100% clear hai bhi.
Executive: Aap nahi sir meri baat to suno na ji hamare dwara ye hai bhi IndiaMART dwara hamare sath cheating ki ja rahi hai. Kyuki ya to unko batana chahiye tha bhi jo 4 lakh wala package hai 3 lakh wala package hai 2 lakh wala package hai hum pehle lead unko dete hai. Theek hai agar sabke paas same lead hai to aapke platform pe dikhni chahiye hum jab marzi usko le lenge ji bas.
Samajh gaye ya baat to sir. Ek ek bylead jo hota hai na sir aapko keval panch log consume kar sakte hai to jaise hi panchve logo ne consume kiya wo out of stock dikhega nahi na sir aapke paas jo agar real time mein.
Customer: Sir baat wahi to baat hai na ji sir jo aapke bade bade magarmach hai na jo aap bade package dete hai nahi nahi sir main sir mere sath sabit karo.
Executive: Sabko sabke package hai aisa nahi hai.
Customer: Na na na sabit karo ji hum bol rahe hai ya aap hame sabit karo kaha se aaoge hum waha aa jate hai Chandigarh aa jate hai Delhi aa jate hai sabit karo na sir usko kare hum bol rahe hai bhi hamare sath cheating ho rahi hai ji.
Executive: Nahi aisa nahi hai aapki jo ye aati hai sir leads aur consumption jo services le rakha hai aapne 17 bylead aati hai jo hafte ki wo consume ho raha hai aur rahi baat sir.
Customer: Ho nahi raha sir ho nahi raha wo to farzi ho raha hai purani lead ho raha hai ji. Batao kaun sa ho raha hai ji.
Executive: Ho rahi hai abhi to aap maine aapko jo bhi hai aapko WhatsApp check karke waha pe bheja video meeting bhi humne dikha diya jo same day ka hai.
Customer: Sir uska video ka kya fayda hai ji meri baat suno. Pehla pehla meri baat to suno sir hame aapka video.
Executive: Pehle meri baat to sun lo na sir.
Customer: Wo aapki baat sun raha hu sir boliye. Sir pata kya hai hame aapka extra benefit hum 100 se ek din mein lenge ji baat aisi hai. Jo hai aapka sir jo aap kehte hai na bhi aapka online ho raha hai aur ho raha hai hame nahi chahiye ji hame sirf jo hamari lead hai wahi hame chahiye ji bas jo platform hai.
Executive: Main aapko bata raha hu last ke 20 bylead maine check kar liya 20 ke 20 aapne same day purchase kar rakha hai sir same day ka purchase kar rakha hai aapne. Sir 200 aapne kiya hua hai. 200 mein.
Executive: Sir last ke 20 bylead is mahine ke 12 tarikh tak ka 20 bylead aapne consume kiya 11 tarikh tak aur sab mein same day ka kiya hai to koi purani bylead aapne nahi purchase kiya ki.
Customer: Sir usme benefit kya hai par meri baat to suno na usko jo aap bol rahe hai usme dekho wo batate tha pain killer hai batate matlab ki wo aur hai wo to farzi lead hai ji.
Executive: Uske aate hai sir uske aate hai wo dusri cheez hai wo kehte hai pehle hum aapka concern tha ki purani.
Customer: Sir meri baat suno pata kya hai aap kuch bhi ghuma fira ke kar do ji isme koi dikkat nahi hai bhi ye hamare paas lead pata kya hai jaise na tuti nal hota hai na nal nal pani wala nal.
Executive: Hmm ji.
Customer: Haan aise hai aapne matlab ki na main kehta hu jaise tamola khelte hai ji main uska udaharan deta hu aapko. Maan lo aap 100 number hai ji aapne apne 10 bande bitha diye aapke maan lo waha soda ho raha hai. Aapne power di paise kharid liya aapne 10 bande bitha diye kisi ne 20 bande bitha diye kisi ne saat bande bitha diye kisi ne do bande bitha diye mere mein jitni power thi maine ek banda bitha diya mere kehne ka maksad hai. Jab usme se number niklega wo koi bhi le sakta hai chahe ek wala le le chahe 20 wala le le chahe panch wala le le chahe teen wala le le hamara maksad ye hai. Aapka jo maksad hai jo matlab ki lead hai na jo number dete hai aap jisne 20 number purchase kiye hue hai aap unko de bas ye hamara maksad hai aur koi maksad nahi hai. Hmm. Bas ye hamara hal kar do ji bas. Samajh gaye aap? Ye ta Hindi mein samjha diya sir. Accha hindi aapko Punjabi thodi aati hai mujhe hindi mein hi bologe sir.
Customer: Sir meri baat suno aapne panch pata kya hai aapne aap mein 10 bando ka power thi aapne 10 le liya. Maine mein panch thi panch le liya. Fir maine power thi do le liya fir mere mein power thi ek le liya. Mera maksad hai waha aapne matlab ki usko damru bajaya number fenk diya mere mein ek thi mere paas aa gaya jisko bhi number aaya usme le liya bas sir. Hmm. Theek hai ki na ji? Bas ye hona chahiye ji isme fraud nahi hona chahiye. Aapka ye abhi do mahine hue hai dedh mahine aapka aayega then bhi dekho result leads aa rahi hai conversion usme kam ho raha hai.
Executive: Sir meri baat suno aap ghuma rahe ho meri baat suno sir pata kya hai aap nahi nahi nahi mere meri baat suno ji aap mujhe jo bhi hai na aap maine mail dali hai mujhe mail mein likh ke de do ji aap zara. Kya likh ke du bataiye. Jo bhi hai aap kehte ho bhi santusht hai hum usko fir mail dalenge aapko agar dikkat aa gayi to hum aapko matlab ki by jo bhi hoga apna matlab ki karwai hogi sir kyuki hamare sath cheating ho rahi hai sir kya kare matlab ki hamara 5 lakh ka nuksan ho gaya ji. Ho rahi hai sir sir koi nuksan nahi hai. Sir pata kya hai sir sir pata kya hai aap soch rahe ho bhi 40000 ka nuksan hai mera 5 lakh ka nuksan ho gaya hai ji. Uska 3 lakh wala thodi masla hai bhi mera 30000 ka nuksan ho gaya sir. Mera 5 lakh ka nuksan ho gaya ji teen month mein ji sir. Kya kare ji hum bacho ko meri baat suno jisne 10 lakh rupya package le raha hai 11 lakh rupya wo aapke 40000 wale pack mein aayega ji. Hum usko bade wala karne wale hai ji karne wale the par halat aise hai jab aapke paas lead hi nahi aa rahi main kaise aapko le lunga ji.
Executive: Sir lead to aa to rahi hai sir kaha lead nahi aa rahi lead consume to kar rahe ho sir main aapke aap apne relevant bylead purchase kar rahe ho.
Customer: Nahi sir nahi isko sir sir aap maan hi nahi rahe ho sir mujhe dikh raha hai aap aao aur maine aapko WhatsApp bhi kiya check kijiye.
Executive: Na na sir isko clear karo. Ji. Tusi innu clear karo ji. Kar raha hu sir last 20 bylead ka main aapko bhej deta hu data sir aapne same day ka purchase kiya hai koi purani bylead nahi aayi aapke paas. 100 100 tablet ka hai aap jo bhi aapne filter out karke purchase kiya haan ji sir. Haan ji haan sir. Same day ka sara bylead aapne same day ka purchase kiya koi purani bylead nahi purchase kiya.
Executive: Nahi sir nahi ji nahi nahi sir isme koi hai. Aapne kar rakha hai aap fir keh rahe nahi sir. Sir aap kar rakha hai aapne aapko WhatsApp check kar lijiye. Hmm. Maine aapko bata diya na ji meri baat suno sir maine aapko clear bata diya na tamole wala kaam ji mujhe wo hona chahiye ji bas. Kya tamole wala nahi matlab de to rahe hai na requirement sir.
Customer: Sir de hi nahi rahe ji. Kya cha rahe ho de nahi rahe ji aap. Kya expectation hai de nahi rahe ji. Kya expectation hai?
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants all leads to be visible.

- Claims leads are not coming.

- Claims old leads are being provided.

- Claims IndiaMART is cheating.



Resolution:

- Executive stated he will check the issue.

- Executive mentioned the customer is purchasing relevant buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send the last 20 buyleads data.



Alert (If Any):

cheating

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, platform, subscription, cheating, visibility
